In this short post, we will go through 10 base r functions that you may have been underutilizing.

1.  `base::lengths, base::rle`
2.  `stats::ave`
3.  `tools::file_path_sans_ext` + `tools::file_ext + base::baseenv`
4.  `stats::reshape, utils::stack`
5.  `base::sprintf`
6.  `base::sweep`
7.  base::Map
8.  `base::replace`
9.  `base::within`
10. `base::strrep`
